text: "Everybody's Crazy 'Bout My Baby" is a song recorded by American country music artist Marie Osmond. It was released in April 1987 as the third single from the album I Only Wanted You. The song reached #24 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Mike Reid. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1987) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|34 |} ==References== Category:1987 singles Category:1986 songs Category:Marie Osmond songs Category:Songs written by Mike Reid (singer) Category:Song recordings produced by Paul Worley Category:Capitol Records singles Category:Curb Records singles
title: Everybody's Crazy 'Bout My Baby
